articles.title: Seven Democrats vie for Georgia governor nomination in 2026
articles.summary: With Brian Kemp term-limited, the 2026 Democratic primary for governor features the most diverse field in Georgia history, including former Atlanta Mayor Keisha Lance Bottoms and State Rep. Ruwa Romman.
articles.relevance: Provides overview of the full Democratic field

articles.title: State Senate District 20 becomes key battleground as Kennedy runs for Lt. Gov
articles.summary: With Senator John F. Kennedy running for Lieutenant Governor, State Senate District 20 will be an open seat in 2026, creating the first competitive opportunity in years for Houston County Democrats.
articles.relevance: Key local race with organizing opportunity

articles.title: Josh McLaurin announces Lt. Governor campaign
articles.summary: State Representative Josh McLaurin officially launched his campaign for Lieutenant Governor, positioning himself as a progressive alternative focused on criminal justice reform and education funding.
